function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Rapid spread of the virus leading to overwhelmed healthcare systems and economic collapse","Mitigation":"Implementing strict infection control measures, vaccination campaigns, and promoting public health measures","Technologies":"Air purification systems, contactless technology, and telemedicine","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and elderly individuals","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health departments, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Unclear routes of virus transmission","Impact":"Difficulty in implementing effective preventive measures and containment strategies","Mitigation":"Conducting research on virus transmission, promoting awareness of potential transmission routes, and developing flexible response plans","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, genetic sequencing, and rapid testing kits","People":"Public health researchers, healthcare professionals, and policymakers","Owner":"Health research institutions, government health agencies, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of population density and migratory flow on transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission in densely populated areas and through migratory movements","Mitigation":"Regulating population movement, conducting targeted testing and surveillance in high-risk areas, and providing support to vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping, population movement analytics, and mobile testing units","People":"Population in high-density areas, migrant populations, and vulnerable communities","Owner":"Government authorities, community organizations, and humanitarian agencies"}]}
